alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 12:12PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Koochiching County through 1245 PM CDT... At 1211 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles northwest of Big Falls, or 30 miles southwest of International Falls, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Littlefork and Pelland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
